Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The randomized Aza patients had more overall infections ( P less than 0 . 05 ) and more nonviral infections ( P less than 0 . 02 ) than the randomized cyclosporine patients .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Infections (overall) |
| Infections (nonviral) |

The paragraph mentions two types of infections: overall infections and nonviral infections. These are the entities that can be identified as diseases in the given context.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Infections (nonviral) |

The paragraph mentions "infections" twice, but only "nonviral infections" can be identified as a disease entity as the other mention refers to "overall infections" which is not a specific disease but a collective term for any type of infection. Therefore, only "nonviral infections" should be included in the table.
